/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out into the distance. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
